verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] abusing his power to levy tariffs over national security , and to pardon federal crimes , and discovering his powers are vast .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: abusing] [ARG1: his power to levy tariffs over national security , and to pardon federal crimes] , and discovering his powers are vast .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is abusing his power to levy tariffs over national security , and to [V: pardon] [ARG1: federal crimes] , and discovering his powers are vast .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is abusing his power to levy tariffs over national security , and to pardon federal crimes , and [V: discovering] [ARG1: his powers are vast] .
President Donald Trump is abusing his power to levy tariffs over national security , and to pardon federal crimes , and discovering [ARG1: his powers] [V: are] [ARG2: vast] .
